General.Name: KPN Property Fund
General.Description: KPN Property Fund is a real estate investment fund launched and managed by Kasikorn Asset Management Co.,Ltd. The fund invests in real estate markets of Thailand. It invest in the freehold right of land and the building of KPN Tower located on the prime location of Rama IX Road. KPN Property Fund is domiciled in Thailand.
